I am responsible for the Platform Engineering tribe at Bitso.  In this role, I am responsible for our Developer Tools/Productivity, Cloud Services and SRE fleets as we pilot a rocket ship of hyper-scale growth to "make crypto useful" for the world.

At Bitso we use the power of crypto to bring access to financial tools and services to a large population of underserved individuals and the Platform tribe is responsible for the technologies that enable and support our world class products and integrations.

I had the pleasure of leading Paymerang’s Enterprise Platforms division. In this role I drove adoption of world class IT practices for DevOps/Platform principles such as CI/CD using AWS CDK, Infrastructure as Code (IaC) also in AWS CDK, test automation, local development best practices and adopton of AWS Connect for call center capabilities.
I founded Tech Ninja to help communities and companies use technology to transform themselves and improve the lives of those they touch.

As part of the Blue Sentry team of fellow Amazon Web Services (AWS) fanatics, my job is to work with existing and prospective customers to understand their current technology, organization and processes to formulate and execute a cloud strategy to transform their business.

I led the PeopleFluent Platform Engineering team as well as our Architecture team.  Together these teams are responsible for driving the creation and adoption of a Shared Services Platform based on the microservices architectural pattern.  This Platform serves as the foundation on which our top rated applications such as Recruiting Management and Talent Management rely for common services such as suite navigation and single sign on (SSO).
